All its members are very keen to set up a business so they can start to help at home as a result of the hard work of all group members and help from the foundation.  Rodrigo is a very hardworking young man who is a carpenter.  He says that he wants to be able to study and make something of himself so he can help his family and cope with everyday hassles.  He is seeking this loan to buy wood and nails to enable him to carry on with his work.  He wants to continue working and fulfil his goals and objectives.

loans.use: to buy wood and nails.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of maize for her porridge and flour for the bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cooking oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more provisions, helping her boost her overall sales.

loans.name: Nelson De Jesús

texts.es:
Nelson tiene 49 años de edad, es casado y padre de 5 hijos. Desde hace 30 años se dedica a fabricar y reparar calzado, actividad que se ha convertido en su fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Aprendió de manera empírica y con la práctica fue perfeccionando su labor y mejorando la calidad de sus productos, los cuales vende a familiares, amigos, vecinos y algunos locales comerciales ubicados en el pueblo donde reside y en pueblos aledaños. El cliente es un hombre comprometido con su labor, emprendedor y dedicado a su familia, quien es el motor de su vida y le da fuerzas para seguir luchando. Actualmente solicita el sexto ciclo de crédito, pues en ellos ha encontrado un apoyo muy grande para sacar adelante su negocio. Este será invertido en la compra de insumos al por mayor (cordones, tela, caucho, pegante) y comprar un repuesto para una máquina que está descompuesta, esto le permitirá continuar con su actividad, reparar la máquina que es el elemento principal para su labor, con la que podrá mejorar su producción, además podrá sacar una línea de tenis que tiene pendiente por falta de  insumos. Esto le ayudará a agilizar su proceso productivo, mejorando además la calidad de los productos terminados y aumentará sus ingresos por ventas. 
Nelson sueña con poder generar ingresos suficientes para tener una estabilidad económica favorable, que le permita brindar una excelente educación universitaria a sus hijos y además desea disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida al lado de su familia.
texts.en:
Nelson is 49 years old, married, and has five children. For the last 30 years he has earned his living making and repairing shoes. With the income from this job he supports his family. He learned the trade on the job and then perfected his work through practice. He sells his high-quality products to family, friends, neighbours as well as to businesses located in his home town and more distant towns. 

Nelson is dedicated to his work. He is enterprising and loves his family wholeheartedly. It is for them that he works hard every day. He is now seeking his sixth loan; the previous ones were a big help to him and his business. The loan money will be used to buy supplies (shoelaces, fabric, rubber, glue) at wholesale prices, and to repair a broken piece of equipment which is vital to his work. He will be able to use it to improve production. Nelson will be able to finish developing a line of runners which he had to stop because of a lack of supplies. The machine will help him streamline the process and improve the quality of the finished products. In turn this will lead to increased sales and income.

Nelson's dream is to be able to generate sufficient income to provide financial stability so he can pay for an excellent university education for his children and give his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: buy supplies (shoelaces, fabric, rubber, glue) and to repair a broken piece of equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of hair creams, hair extensions, and a hair dryer, thus allowing her to meet rising customers’ demands.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more ingredients to prepare  her food for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her existing  ladies' and children's clothing inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more provisions, helping her boost her overall sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more foodstuffs to prepare her dishes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more provisions and boost her overall sales.

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla is 52 years old and married, with six children, two of whom are in school.

Priscilla works hard to provide for her family. She runs a direct-selling household products business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional products to sell.

Priscilla has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the direct-selling household products business for nine years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Priscilla aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy addittional household products to sell.

loans.name: Hildebrando De Jesús

texts.es:
Hildebrando, con 43 años de edad es casado y padre de 2 hijos de 18 y 21 años. Desde que tenía 24 años trabaja como independiente, pues con el apoyo de un hermano montó una panadería y obtuvo conocimientos en esta labor gracias al panadero con el que trabajaba; este negocio funcionó por 10 años debido a que se le presentó la oportunidad de radicarse en el exterior por algunos años. Hace un tiempo regresó al país y con algunos ahorros pudo comprar su casa propia en un primer piso, con el objetivo de montar otro negocio que le ayudara a solventar las necesidades de su hogar. En el mes de Mayo de 2012 montó una tienda de abarrotes, aprovechando la ventaja de que el sector donde reside se encuentra en crecimiento urbanístico, por lo que hasta el momento le ha dado buenos resultados, además cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa para el manejo de éste. Hildebrando es un hombre emprendedor, pujante, responsable y dedicado a su familia y a su labor, siempre va en busca de nuevas opciones que le ayuden a salir adelante y ha encontrado apoyo en varios créditos que ha obtenido anteriormente. En el momento solicita el sexto ciclo de crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de activo fijo (vitrina exhibidora) y surtido al por mayor (productos de aseo, carnes frías, lácteos, mecato, galletería, y otros productos de la canasta familiar), esto le dará una mejor imagen a su negocio, atraerá más clientela y tendrá mayor cantidad de inventario disponible para satisfacer las necesidades y gustos de todos sus clientes; lo que se verá reflejado en el incremento de sus ventas y sus ingresos. 
Hildebrando sueña con hacer crecer su negocio hasta convertirlo en un supermercado, en el que pueda ofrecer oportunidades de empleo y, que le genere los recursos suficientes para brindar a sus hijos una excelente educación universitaria, para que tengan un futuro prometedor y exitoso, además podrá disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida al lado de su familia.
texts.en:
Hildebrando, age 43, is married and has two children, ages 18 and 21.  He has been working independently since he was 24 years old.  With his brother’s support he established a bakery and gained knowledge about this work, thanks to the baker with whom he used to work.  This business lasted for ten years.  Then he had the opportunity to relocate abroad for some years.

Some time ago he returned to the country, and with some savings he was able to buy his own house on the first floor.  His objective for doing so was to establish another business, which would help him pay for the household necessities.  

In May of 2012 he opened a grocery story.  He was taking advantage of the fact that the area where he lives is showing urban growth.  So far it has given him good results.  His wife helps him manage it.  Hildebrando is an enterprising, vigorous, and responsible man who devotes himself to his family and his work.

He is always looking for new options to help him get ahead, and he has found support through various loans that he has received in the past.  He is now requesting his sixth loan cycle.  He will do this in order to buy fixed goods (display case) and to buy stock (hygiene products, cold meats, dairy products, pastries, cookies, and other basic needs products) wholesale.  This will give his business a better image, it will attract more customers, and he will have a greater quantity of inventory available to satisfy the needs and preferences of all of his customers.  That will be reflected in the increase in sales and revenue.

Hildebrando dreams of making his business grow and become a supermarket in which he will be able to offer employment opportunities.  This will generate enough resources to provide his children with an excellent university education so that they will have a promising and successful future.  He will also be able to enjoy a better quality of life alongside his family.

loans.use: to buy a display case and stock for his store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her existing cooking utensils capacity

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
This loan will help Maria purchase her own cleaning supplies and equipment to grow her residential and commercial cleaning company.

As a young woman in Colombia, Maria always dreamed of living in the United States. After years of planning, Maria and her husband had saved enough to move to Hollywood, FL in 2009 with high hopes of securing a more prosperous future. However, although she now lived on U.S. soil, Maria discovered that securing a well-paid job was harder than she anticipated. She worked for a residential cleaning company but, despite the long hours, her wages were not enough to support her new lifestyle. 

Realizing she could earn a larger profit by running her own business, she began Manantial Multiservice, Inc., a cleaning company that services homes, local businesses, retail stores and gyms. 

Her business is growing quickly and Maria now needs a loan to purchase more cleaning supplies and equipment in order to meet her clients’ demand.

loans.use: to purchase cleaning supplies and additional cleaning equipment

loans.name: Patience

texts.en:
This loan will help Patience purchase the software and computer system she needs to keep her local pharmacy competitive. 

Originally from Nigeria, Patience made a stable career for herself in New York City as a pharmacist. After years of working in large pharmacies, she decided to begin her own pharmacy to offer personalized and friendly care to her local community. In August 2012, Patience began PeeGee’s Pharmacy and Surgical Supplies, providing pharmaceutical needs as well as surgical supplies for local medical offices throughout Queens, NY. 

Now looking to expand her business and offer more products to her customers, Patience needs to update her computer system to enhance productivity and improve her customer service capabilities. This loan will help Patience purchase the software system as well as to upgrade her storefront appearance with new signage to attract more customers. 

Patience lives with her daughter and hopes to continue to grow her business in order to contribute to her community’s development.

loans.use: to purchase an up-to-date computer and database system.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her existing African print cloth  capacity

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of hair creams, hair extensions, and a hair dryer

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Renacer  está en su ciclo 5to del programa de comité, es un grupo bastante numeroso, donde todas y cada una de ellas están poniendo su mejor esfuerzo por salir adelante. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, como medio de conocer la situación de cada una.
Una persona muy trabajadora es Zunilda, quien vende prendas de todo tipo y clase. Tiene muy buena clientela, y gracias a que tiene siempre muy buena variedad de ropas está ganando cada día. Su meta es poder tener una gran tienda de ropas, y de esa forma seguir luchando por dar a su familia lo que necesitan para cubrir sus necesidades del día a día y que no pasen necesidades.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en comprar prendas, como ser jeans, remeras, camisas y demás prendas. Están agradecidas todas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group called Renacer or Rebirth is in its 5th cycle of the program. It is a rather large group, where each and every one of them are putting their best effort forward to get ahead in life. They are doing a survey of poverty elimination as a way of determining the status of each. One very hardworking person is Zunilda, who sells garments of all kinds and types. She has a good customer base, and since she always has a very good variety of clothing she is earning daily. Her goal is to be able to have a great clothing store, and in this way continue to struggle to give her family what they need to cover their daily needs so that they do not go without.
She is requesting this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of garments like jeans, t-shirts, shirts, and other garments. They are all thankful for the opportunity that they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy jeans, t-shirts, shirts, and other garments.

loans.name: Dulcesima

texts.en:
Dulcesima is 56 years old and widowed with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Dulcesima runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like bread, coffee, sugar, canned goods, soft-drinks, etc. to sell in her general store.

Dulcesima has been in this business for 13 years and sells a variety of items such as bread, coffee, sugar, canned goods, soft-drinks, etc. 

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like bread, coffee, sugar, canned goods, soft-drinks, etc. to sell in her general store

loans.name: Owen

texts.en:
This loan will help Owen expand his tutoring business and reach out to more students, of all ages, looking to advance their education. 

Owen moved from Saint Lucia to New York City 15 years ago. After earning his masters degree in music education, he began offering music lessons to students in his local Brooklyn community. Owen discovered that he not only enjoyed teaching music, but enjoyed teaching in general.  In addition to offering music lessons, he took a job teaching math and English to elementary and middle school students. 

After years of gaining experience teaching, Owen decided to open his own home-based business, Roken-4-Life Tutoring Agency, in January 2013. While his company’s main focus is aimed towards helping disadvantaged high school students prepare for college exams, he also offers tutoring help in all school subjects and provides music lessons in a wide range of instruments and genres. Owen now hires four tutors to help him give private lessons in the students’ homes or in local libraries.

Wishing to expand his tutoring business, Owen is looking for a loan to hire another tutor and to invest in marketing and advertising in order to attract more students. He recently launched a website at: http://www.roken4life.com/

loans.use: to hire an employee and to purchase marketing and advertising supplies.

loans.name: Darren

texts.en:
This loan will allow Darren to offer delivery service for his home security system retail and installation business.

Darren noticed a lack of affordable quality home security systems available to residents in his local community in Lexington, North Carolina. Wanting to fill this niche, he began his own business Home Smart, LLC. in March 2012, selling and installing security systems made by Laser Shield. His home-based business has already grown significantly and he now hires five employees and plans to soon offer a delivery service to his clients. He now needs a loan to purchase additional inventory to keep up with the growing demand as well as to buy a work vehicle in order to make his business deliveries.

Darren has plans to soon move into an office space and expand his business to help other local communities.

loans.use: to purchase inventory and a used vehicle to launch delivery service.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
This loan will help Elizabeth purchase a new vehicle to more comfortably accommodate her clients as she assists them in commuting from their homes to their doctors’ appointments. 

Elizabeth moved from Cuba to Miami 10 years ago to create a more stable future for her daughter. However, she fell ill with a health condition that forced her to spend most of her time in hospitals, to hire an assistant to help her commute to and from her daily treatments, and to file bankruptcy. After successfully recovering in 2010, Elizabeth decided that she wanted to provide others with similar needed assistance in commuting to their appointments. 

She opened her own transportation business, Bright Start, providing a convenient and comfortable way to help patients commute from their homes to their scheduled clinical appointments. While her business began small - she began by driving clients around Florida in her own car, Elizabeth now employs five and operates three vans. Her daughter is attending college and Elizabeth hopes to expand her business to supply transportation services to more clinics in the Miami area. 

This loan will help Elizabeth purchase another van to provide more comfortable and accommodating transportation for her clients, as well as hire another employee.

loans.use: to purchase a vehicle that can better accommodate patients and to hire an employee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cosmetics, indirectly helping her boost her overall sales

loans.name: Scott

texts.en:
This loan will help Scott purchase a new cinema camera to help him take his film production business to the next level. 

Growing up in New York City, Scott has always had a passion for film and cinematography. After working as an Asset Protection Manager for years, Scott decided to turn his hobby into a career. In 2010, Scott launched his own business, Dream Dept Media. His production company creates visual content for recording artists looking for music videos to present their talent, as well as for marketing companies needing promotional material to present new clothing lines or products. He has already been hired to film projects for several large brands, including: Pepsi, Foot Locker, and Tommy Hilfiger. 

Scott is looking to expand his production company and needs a loan to purchase a new cinema camera. The new camera will allow Scott to produce videos with the professional quality he needs to be competitive in the industry. 

To view more about Dream Dept Media, visit: http://thedreamdept.com/

loans.use: to purchase a new cinema camera

loans.name: Nelibeth

texts.en:
Nelibeth is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell vegetable and fruit business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more vegetables and fruit to sell at her buy and sell vegetable and fruit business.

Nelibeth has been in this business for two years; she earns more income from raising pigs.

Nelibeth has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables and fruit to sell

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
As the married mother of four children, Susana works hard to support her family.

She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Susana is borrowing PHP 40,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Susana has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ndella

texts.fr: Madame Ndélla est une femme qui habite dans un village d'environs 8km du Guichet. Elle est mariée et mère de famille, elle a une expérience de plus de 15 ans dans cet activité. Agée de 48ans , elle sollicite ce montant pour acheter des montons et chèvres afin de renforcer son cheptel. Madame Ndélla aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais scolaires de ses enfants. A l'avenir elle souhaite avoir plus de crédits pour développer son petit commerce et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
Madame Ndélla is a woman who lives in a village about 8 km from the branch office. She is married and the mother of a family, and she has more than 15 years' experience in her business. Aged 48, she is requesting this amount to buy some sheep and goats to expand her flock. 

Madame  Ndélla helps her husband  to cover their daily expenditures and the school fees for her children. In future, she would like to have more loans so as to develop her little trade and improve living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats to raise.

loans.name: Digna

texts.en:
As the married parent of three children, Digna works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell fertilized duck embryo (balut) business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from native mat making. Digna is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase more eggs to sell for her buy and sell fertilized duck embryo business.

Digna successfully paid back her previous loan, and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Digna has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more eggs to sell

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
As the married parent of two children, Eden works hard to support her family.

She has a weaving native basket business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending.  Eden is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials for her weaving native basket business.

Eden has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her weaving native basket  business

loans.name: Rosmery

texts.es: Rosmery a sus 59 años de edad es una mujer separada y vive sola, ya que no tuvo hijos. Desde hace aproximadamente 40 años, se ha dedicado a la venta de mercancía por catálogo y a realizar arreglos de modistería. Estas actividades las aprendió de manera empírica y poco a poco fue perfeccionando su técnica, gracias a su trayectoria ha logrado ser reconocida en todo el sector y esto le ha generado los ingresos necesarios para su sustento. Rosmery es una señora luchadora y activa, siempre va buscando opciones que le ayuden a salir adelante y ha encontrado apoyo en algunos créditos que ha realizado anteriormente, pues gracias a ellos su negocio ha permanecido en el tiempo. Actualmente solicita su quinto ciclo crediticio, para invertirlo en la compra de activos fijos (máquina plana) y mercancía al por mayor (perfumería, cosméticos, bisutería, cremas corporales), esto le permitirá continuar con ambas labores, pues podrá prestar un mejor servicio, entregando productos con excelente terminación y además tendrá variedad de mercancía disponible para satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes, esto se verá reflejado en el incremento de los ingresos por ventas. Rosmery sueña con darle continuidad a sus negocios por muchos años más para poder disfrutar en su vejez de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosmery, 59, is separated and lives alone since she had no children.  For about the last 40 years she’s been selling merchandise via catalog and doing dressmaking.  She learned these activities empirically and gradually perfected her technique.  Thanks to her long history she’s succeeded in becoming well-known throughout her sector and this has generated the income she’s needed for her support.

Rosmery’s a hardworking, active woman who is always looking for options that will help her get ahead and she’s found support in loans she’s taken out previously because thanks to them her business has remained over time.

She’s currently requesting her 5th loan cycle to buy fixed assets (plane machine) and merchandise at wholesale (perfumery, cosmetics, costume jewelry, body cream).  This will make it possible for her to continue with both activities because she’ll be able to provide better service delivering excellently finished items and she will also have a variety of merchandise on-hand to meet all her customers’ needs.  This will be reflected in increased sales income.  Rosmery dreams with giving continuity to her businesses for many more years so that she can enjoy an old age with better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es: María, a sus 40 años de edad es separada y madre de 4 hijos. Por falta de oportunidades laborales y por la difícil situación económica que atravesó luego de ser abandonada por su esposo, ella decidió buscar opciones para salir adelante junto a sus hijos, por lo que hace 7 años comenzó a vender mercancía por catálogo para conseguir ingresos por cuenta propia, ya que debía solventar los gastos de su hogar. La cliente es una mujer emprendedora, activa y dedicada a su familia y a su labor; esto la motiva para solicitar el crédito que invertirá en la compra de activo fijo (vitrina exhibidora) y mercancía al por mayor (cremas corporales, cosméticos, perfumería, accesorios, cremas faciales) con el fin de darle una mejor imagen a su negocio, exhibiendo bien sus productos y además, tendrá variedad de mercancía disponible para satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes. Esto se verá reflejado en el incremento de la rentabilidad y sus ingresos, con lo cual podrá seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de sus sueño que es darle continuidad a su negocio, para que sea sostenible y perdurable en el tiempo y, que le genere los recursos necesarios para solventar las necesidades básicas del hogar y poder apoyar a sus hijos, ofreciéndoles una mejor educación, para que en un futuro cercano todos puedan gozar de mejores condiciones de vida y un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
María, 40, is separated and mother of four children.  Due to the lack of employment opportunities and because of the difficult economic situation she went through after being abandoned by her husband, she decided to find options to get ahead alongside her children.  So seven years ago she started to sell merchandise via catalog in order to earn income on her own because she had to cover her household expenses.

She’s an enterprising woman dedicated to her work and family.  This motivates her to request the loan that she’ll use to buy a fixed asset (display case) and merchandise at wholesale (body cream, cosmetics, perfumery, accessories, face cream) in order to give her business better appearance displaying her products well also having variety of merchandise on-hand to meet customer needs and tastes.  

This will be reflected in increased profitability and income with which she will be able to continue advancing towards her dream of giving continuity to her business so that it will be sustainable and last over time generating income to meet basic household needs and to be able to support her children giving them a better education so that in the near future they will be able to enjoy better living conditions and improved well-being.

loans.use: to buy a display case and to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Luchadoras está en su ciclo número  3 del programa de comité. Es un grupo muy unido y responsable.
Una de las integrantes es Alma, quien se dedica a la venta de comidas que ella misma hace y en lo que le está yendo muy bien. Es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora.
La sra. Alma solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para su elaboración de comidas, como ser verduras, carnes, pollo, jamón, queso y demás, lo que le ayudará a  concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe, que le ayudará a seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
The group called “Mujeres Luchadoras” (Tenacious Women) is in cycle #3 in the committee program.  It’s a much unified, responsible group.

One of the members is Alma who works selling food she makes herself; she’s doing very well.  She’s a very hardworking, tenacious person.

Alma is requesting this loan to buy food preparation ingredients like vegetables, meats, chicken, ham, cheese and others that will help her meet her business plan which in turn will help her improve her income.  She’s grateful for the opportunity she’s getting that will help her continue working.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, chicken, ham, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
La señorita Liz tiene 30 años, es soltera, tiene una despensa en la que trabaja hace un poco más de dos años, comenta que empero muy modestamente, pero que gracias a su esfuerzo fue creciendo.
Habilitó hace 3 meses una boca de cobranza de servicios, es la única de la zona y actualmente su clientela aumentó por lo que su propósito con el crédito retirado es renovar su stock de insumos en la despensa como artículos de limpieza, lácteos y enlatados. Ella agradece por la oportunidad que están recibiendo, que le será de mucha ayuda en su emprendimiento.
texts.en: Liz, who is a single woman of 30, has a shop where she has worked for a little over two years.  She says she began in a very modest way but, thanks to her efforts, the business grew.  3 months ago, she set up a paypoint terminal (the only one in the area) and her clientele grew.  Therefore, she plans to use the credit drawn to stock up with supplies for her shop such as cleaning products, dairy products and tinned goods.  She is grateful to have been given this opportunity which will be very helpful to her in her  endeavour.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products, dairy products and tinned goods.

loans.name: San Miguel Arcangel Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Miguel Arcangel está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 4 de ellas están esforzándose el doble, ya que están en un nivel bajo de ingresos y quieren poder mejorarlo y ayudar a sus familias por medio de su esfuerzo.
Carmen por medio de sus ventas y el esfuerzo que pone por poder ir mejorando es que está creciendo en su microemprendimiento. Ella tiene una despensa que con mucho sacrificio está manteniendo. Por medio de su negocio su familia puede tener lo que necesita y no pasar por necesidades. Ella hoy solicita del crédito para poder comprar insumos para su despensa, y así seguir ofreciendo buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group called “San Miguel Arcángel” (St. Michael the Archangel) is taking the poverty elimination survey; four of them are making a double effort because they are low-income and they want to be able to improve and to help their families by means of their effort.

By means of her sales and effort she makes to be able to improve, Carmen’s micro business is growing.  She has a grocery store that she’s maintaining with much sacrifice.  Her family is able to have what they need and not go through any wants by means of her business.  Today, she’s requesting a loan to be able to buy merchandise for her store thus continuing to offer good variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou est une femme agée de 56ans qui habite dans un village non loin du Guichet. Elle évolue dans le secteur de l'élevage et a une expérience de plus e 10ans dans cet activité. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle aide son mari dans les charges quotidiennes de la famille. Elle demande ce crédit pour acheter des moutons et chèvres afin de pouvoir  augmenter son cheptel.  A l'avenir elle voudrait faire du maraichage afin de diversifier son activité et augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en:
Madame Fatou is a woman of 56 who lives in a village not far from the Branch Office. She works at raising animals and has more than 10 years' experience in this business. She is married and the mother of a family. She helps her husband with the daily expenditures of the family. 

Madame Fatou  is requesting this loan to buy sheep and goats to expand her flock. In future, she would like to do market gardening so as to diversify her business and grow her income from it.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats to raise and later sell.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell through                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           her buy-and sell-charcoal business.

Margie has been in this business for three years. Margie earns more income from farming rice.

Margie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child who is in school, Marissa works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Marissa is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to purchase additional charcoal to sell for her business buying and selling charcoal.

Marissa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional charcoal to sell

loans.name: Ivan

texts.en:
This loan will help Ivan improve his Karate studio to provide better services and classes to his students. 

Venezuelan athlete Ivan has a large number of regional and world championships under his black Karate belt. But despite the many titles he’s accrued over the years, one of his dreams remained unfulfilled: that of opening a Karate academy as an afterschool program for children. When Ivan and his wife moved from Venezuela to Deerfield Beach, FL eight years ago, the couple began the Traditional Karate Center of Florida, an academy designed to not only teach Karate skills but also to inspire children to live a healthy lifestyle.

Ivan offers Karate lessons for kids and adults as well as bodyguard training, while his wife runs an afterschool program to help the working parents within the community. The afterschool program currently has a waiting list of 45 students. Ivan and his wife are looking to remodel their studio space to better accommodate their many classes and large enrollments. This loan will allow them to paint, remodel the floor, and fix the door to create a safer and more comfortable space for their community.

To read more about Ivan’s Karate Center, visit: http://www.tkcof.com.

loans.use: to remodel the Karate studio by replacing the floor and the door and purchasing paint for the interior.

loans.name: Shayla

texts.en:
This loan will help Shayla remodel her home-office into a professional space to hold classes and workshops for her childbirth education business.

Shayla graduated from Florida A&M University with a degree in Construction Engineering Technology. However, although she worked in the construction field for several years, Shayla realized her true passion after she gave birth to her first of five children. Finding beauty in child birth, Shayla wanted to share her knowledge and excitement with other women. In May 2008, she began Birthdiva, LLC, a business that teaches women about child birth and coaches other birthing professionals how to best help their own clients. 

Her business is quickly gaining popularity. In order to keep up with the demand for her courses, Shayla needs a loan to turn her home-office into a professional studio. This loan will be used to purchase furniture and to add a separate door for privacy, as well as to update her online website so she can hold virtual courses in order to expand her services to mothers and professionals residing outside of her local Maryland community.

loans.use: to purchase furniture for her new home-based studio and to update her website to host virtual courses.

loans.name: Cheikh

texts.fr: Monsieur Cheikh est un homme agé de 37 ans qui est marié et père de famille. Il habite aux environs du Guichet et évolue dans le secteur de l'embouche bovine. Il a une expérience de plus de 10ans dans cet activité. Il sollicite ce montant pour acheter des bœufs afin de les revendre. Monsieur cheikh est chargé de gérer les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. A l'avenir il souhaite diversifier son activité en pratiquant l'élevage intensif. Ainsi il pourra augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Monsieur Cheikh is a man of 37 who is married and the father of a family. He lives near the Branch Office and has been working at fattening cattle. He has more than 10 years of experience in this business. He has requested this loan to buy cattle for resale. 

Monsieur Cheikh is responsible for the daily expenditures of his family and the school fees of his children. In future, he would like to diversify his business and do intensive livestock raising. Thus he would be able to grow his income and improve the living conditions of his children.

loans.use: to buy cattle to resell afterwards.

loans.name: Luciano

texts.es:
El Sr. Luciano, esta en pareja,  tiene 3 hijos en edad escolar. El mismo tiene un negocio familiar, se dedica a la venta de flores en gral. ante la necesidad de acceder a otros ingresos, decidió capacitarse y estudiar una profesión, es por eso que está estudiando la carrera de refrigeración.
El mismo estableció un objetivo que es tener una profesión. Su inspiración son sus hijos a quienes desea brindar una vida digna, apoyarles también en sus estudios. El solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de estudios.
texts.en:
Sr. Luciano and his wife have three school-aged children. He runs a family business selling flowers. Because of the need to earn more money Luciano decided to take further training and get a professional qualification. He is taking courses in refrigeration.

His goal is to learn a trade. His inspiration is his children for whom he wishes to provide a good life and an education. Luciano is seeking this loan so he can pay for his courses.

loans.use: pay course fees

loans.name: Arleen

texts.en:
Arleen works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Arleen requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to buy additional chorizo, hotdogs, tocino, etc. to sell to her customers.

Arleen has been in this business for four years now.

In the future, Arleen would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional chorizo, hotdogs, tocino, etc. to sell to her customers

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 46 years old and married with two children who are in school.

Imelda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell like soap, canned goods, sugar, etc.

Imelda has borrowed and repaid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Imelda aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell like soap, canned goods, sugar, etc

loans.name: María Nury

texts.es: María, a sus 51 años de edad es madre soltera de un hijo de 20 años. Toda su vida productiva la ha dedicado a trabajar en el sector de confección, actividad que aprendió de forma empírica, pero que poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando, pues lleva muchos años confeccionando para terceros. De esta manera ha obtenido los recursos para el sostenimiento de su hijo y para solventar los gastos de su hogar, pues toda la carga económica recayó sobre ella después de que el padre de su hijo los abandonara. María es una mujer activa, emprendedora, conoce y le gusta mucho lo que hace, por eso ha sabido sobrepasar los obstáculos que se le presentan. Actualmente solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de activo fijo (máquina plana) e insumos al por mayor (tela, botones, hilos, elásticos), todo esto con el fin de darle continuidad a su negocio y poder agilizar su proceso y terminar la producción de un contrato que tiene pendiente y entregarlo de manera oportuna, con los productos bien terminados. Esto le ayudará a conseguir más clientes como referidos y podrá aumentar sus ingresos; lo cual le ayudará sustancialmente para cumplir el sueño de ampliar el negocio y poder brindar oportunidades de empleo a otras madres solteras, además desea ofrecer a su hijo una educación universitaria de muy buena calidad para que tenga un futuro exitoso y puedan disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and is a single mother with a son aged 20. All of her working life she has worked in the sewing trade, having learnt the skills from scratch. Gradually she has perfected her work as she has spent many years working for third parties. By doing this she has earned enough to bring up her son and meet the household living costs, after all of the economic responsibility fell on her shoulders when her son's father abandoned them. Maria is an active and entrepreneurial woman who is good at what she does and enjoys it, and so has been able to deal with obstacles which have occurred.

Currently she is asking for a loan to buy a fixed asset (flat sewing machine) and wholesale supplies (fabric, buttons, thread, elastic). This is with the aim of providing continuity for her business and being able to speed up her process. She wants to finish the production of an outstanding contract and deliver well-finished products in a timely fashion. This will help her to get more customers via referrals and she will be able to increase her income, which will be a great help towards fulfilling her dream of expanding the business and being able to offer employment opportunities to other single mothers. She also wants to offer her son a good quality university education so he can have a successful future and so they can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a fixed asset (flat sewing machine) and wholesale supplies (fabric, buttons, thread, elastic).

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es estudiante, vive en la ciudad de Villarrcia. El se sacrifica día a día para poder culminar su carrera y poder ser un profesional que pueda ayudar a las demás personas.
Está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agroindustrial, lo cual quiere aprender para poder ayudar a las personas que necesitan. Es un estudiante con ansias de ser alguien en la vida y sentirse útil.
Solicita de este crédito y quiere invertirlo en pagar sus clases y así seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Francisco is a student. He lives in the city of Villarica. He makes sacrifices every day to be able to complete his degree and become a professional who can help other people.

He is studying agro-industrial engineering, which he wants to learn to be able to help people who need it. He is a student who wants to be someone in life and feel useful. 

He requests this loan to invest in paying for his classes so that he can continue to study.

loans.use: to pay for college courses.

loans.name: Tajy Poty Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de Mujeres Emprendedoras que lleva por nombre Tajy Poty se encuentra en el 11er. Ciclo del programa cuenta con 15 integrantes actualmente. Es un grupo caracterizado por tener un espíritu de solidaridad, ayuda mutua y responsabilidad.
Una de las historias dignas de destacar es el de la señora  Juana de 28 años, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras  actividad que lo realiza en su casa  y también entrega de los pedidos a domicilio, ella gracias a su trabajo demuestra que con esfuerzo se puede salir adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras frescas con lo que podrá seguir creciendo y mejorando sus ventas.
texts.en:
This group of entrepreneurial women, named Tajy Poty, is in the 11th cycle of the program. The group currently has 15 members and is characterized by a spirit of solidarity, mutual help, and responsibility.
One of the stories worth highlighting is that of Juana, 28 years old. She makes her living buying and selling vegetables; she does this from her house and also makes deliveries. Thanks to her business, she demonstrates that one can get ahead through effort.
She is requesting this loan to buy fresh vegetables so that she will be able to continue growing and improving her sales.

loans.use: to buy fresh vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 28 years old and married with two children. With both children currently in school, Alma works very hard to provide for them.

Alma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more goods to sell in her general store.

Alma has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as noodles, cooking oil, sugar, coffee, canned goods, etc. 

In the future, Alma would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell in her general store

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling ready to wear clothes in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy additional ready to wear clothes to sell for her business buying and selling ready to wear clothes.

Erlinda has been in this business for 20 years. She earns more income from raising pigs, food vending and a general store.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional ready to wear clothes to sell

loans.name: Joann

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Joann works hard to support her family.

She has a ambulant spice vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending. Joann is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy additional spices to sell for her  business.

Joann has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family and save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional spices to sell

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Rebecca works hard to support her family.

She has a food-vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from farming rice. Rebecca is borrowing PHP 20,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

Rebecca has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Almie

texts.en:
Almie is 33 years old and married with two children.

Almie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, sugar, bread, cooking oil and other groceries to sell in her general store.

Almie has borrowed and paid back three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns additional income from food vending.

Almie aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, sugar, bread, cooking oil and other groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Mignane

texts.fr: Madame Mignane est une brave femme qui est cultivateur de profession. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle a une expérience de 10ans dans cet activité. Mignane sollicite ce montant pour acheter des semences et préparer a cultiver son champs. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais scolaires de ses enfants. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Mignane souhaite augmenter son périmètre de culture pour augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille .
texts.en:
Madame Mignane is a good woman who is a farmer by trade. She is married and the mother of a family. She has 10 years' experience in her business. 

 Mignane requested  this loan to buy seeds and prepare to cultivate her field. She helps her husband to cover the daily expenditures and the school fees for their children. She begins her day at 8 am and ends it at 7 pm. Mignane would like to expand her arable land to grow her income and improve living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds to cultivate her field.

loans.name: 11.01.01 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tâm operates a food stall/restaurant, selling rice noodles. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice noodles and meat to cook soup to sell.

Tâm is 54 years old. She is married, with one child. Tâm  is the group leader of the 11.01.01 Trường Thi solidarity group, which consists of seven members. Each member will use her portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their family's living.  

Tam lives with one dependent and works in Thanh Hoa city, a semi-urban area in Thanh Hoa province. This is her first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Tâm has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that she  faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business, Tâm would like for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase rice noodles and meat to cook soup to sell.

loans.name: Lim

texts.en: Lim is 50 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling clothes for more than ten years, earning approximately $8 daily. Her husband is a construction worker who makes about $8 per day. In addition, they are also rice farmers. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $9 each day. In order to improve her farming process, Lim is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase cattle for farming. This purchase will help her reduce her farming expenses. In the future, she would like to run an additional business and rebuild her house to make it much stronger and more comfortable for the family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for farming

loans.name: Marifat

texts.ru:
Маърифат работает в центральной поликлинике своего города.  Она медсестра.  У Маърифат  3 сыновей.  Старший сын находиться далеко от дома, он живет и работает со своей семьёй в другой стране, но по возможности присылает деньги для Маърифат.  Второй сын Маърифат работает в лепешечному цеху.  
Маърифат обратилась в МДО Арванд чтобы получить кредит для ремонта  крыши своего дома. За несколько лет шифер испортился, и после сильного дождя  крыша начала протекать и теперь Маърифат хочет провести  ремонт .   Маърифат очень надеется,что до зимы она отремонтирует крышу.   Но накопленные средства недостаточны , так как на покупки нового шифера и ремонта кровли потребуется больше денег.   Маърифат с сыном очень надеются, что Арванд поможет им и финансово поддержит.
texts.en:
Marifat works at a central polyclinic in her city. She is a nurse. Marifat has three sons. The eldest son lives far away from home; he and his family live and work in another country. However, when possible he sends money to Marifat. Marifat's second son works in an in-store bakery. 

Marifat turned to MDO Arvand in order to get a loan for repairing the roof of her house. For several years the slate has deteriorated, and after heavy rain the roof started leaking. Currently Marifat would like to carry out repairs. 

Marifat very much hopes that she can repair the roof before the winter, but the money she has saved up is not sufficient. To purchase new slate and repair the roof she needs more money. Marifat and her son very much hope that Arvand will help them and support financially.

loans.use: to purchase building material for repairing the roof

loans.name: Mamadou

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou est un célibataire qui habite dans les environs du Guichet. Agé de 33 ans, c'est un commerçant de profession qui évolue dans la vente de prêt à porter. Il a une expérience de plus de 17 ans dans cet activité, il commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 18h. Mamadou a besoin de ce crédit pour augmenter son stock de marchandises en achetant des habits qu'il va exposer dans son magasin. Il participe dans la gestion des dépenses familiales de sa famille. A l'avenir il souhaite diversifier son commerce pour pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et afin construire sa maison.
texts.en:
Monsieur Mamadou is a single man who lives near the Branch Office. Aged 33, he is a professional merchant who has been selling ready-to-wear clothing. He has more than 17 years of experience in this business. He begins his workday at 8 am and ends it at 6 pm. 

Mamadou needs this loan to expand his stock of merchandise by buying clothing that he will display in his store. He contributes to covering the family expenses in his family. In future, he hopes to diversify his business in order to increase his revenue and to build his house.

loans.use: to buy and sell ready-to-wear clothing

loans.name: Julia Inés

texts.es:
Julia es madre soltera de una hija de 24 años y hace poco se convirtió en abuela. Toda su vida productiva la ha dedicado a trabajar en el área de confección, hace varios años montó su propio taller y actualmente le confecciona a terceros, hace arreglos de modistería y además presta el servicio de fotocopias y recargas a celular. Estas actividades le han generado los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar, pues toda la carga económica recae sobre ella, debido a que el padre de su hija nunca le ha colaborado económicamente. Ella elabora todo tipo de prendas pero en especial trabaja con tejido de punto. Julia es una mujer luchadora, pujante, activa y dedicada a su familia y a su labor, poco a poco ha ido invirtiendo dinero en su negocio para hacerlo crecer. Su última adquisición fue una máquina recubridora, la cual ocupa mucho espacio y por lo tanto el lugar donde tiene su taller ya está muy estrecho. Por esta razón se motiva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito, pues desea realizar unas adecuaciones locativas, para lo cual debe tumbar una pared y poner un ventanal, con el fin de aprovechar al máximo la luz natural y trabajar con mayor comodidad. Esto se verá reflejado en la reducción del tiempo de producción y así podrá entregar los pedidos pendientes de manera oportuna. 
Julia sueña con darle continuidad a su negocio, pero implementar a mediano plazo la fabricación de prendas con su línea propia de lencería, ropa deportiva y artículos para el hogar, de esta manera podrá ofrecer más oportunidades de empleo a madres cabeza de hogar y podrá mejorar las condiciones de vida para que su nieta pueda disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julia is a single mother. She has a 24-year-old daughter and recently became a grandmother. All of her working life, she has been a seamstress. Many years ago, she started her own tailoring workshop and she currently does sewing for third parties, tailors clothing, and also provides photocopying services and reloads credit on cell phones.

These activities provide her with the income necessary to sustain her home since all of the economic responsibilities fall on her because the father of her daughter never contributed economically.

She makes all types of garments, but her specialty is knitting. 

Julia is a persistent, thriving, active woman who is dedicated to her family and to her work. Little by little, she has been investing money in her business to make it grow. Her last acquisition was a coverstitch sewing machine, which occupies a lot of space and, due to this, her workshop is very tight. For this reason, she requests the support of a loan, since she hopes to make some adaptations to her workshop by demolishing a wall and installing a large window. Her goal is to use natural light to its full potential and be able to work comfortably. This will result in a shorter production time and will allow her to return the pending orders in a timely manner.

Julia dreams of her business surviving for a long time but, in the mean time, she would like to implement the production of her own line of lingerie, sportswear, and home goods. This would allow her to offer more employment opportunities to women who are the heads of their households and will also allow her to improve her living conditions so that her granddaughter can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to make adaptations to her workshop by demolishing a wall and installing a large window.

loans.name: 11.01.03 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoàn has a retail business selling porcelain products (e.g., bowls, plates, cups). She is requesting a loan to purchase porcelain products (e.g., bowls, plates, cups) to resell.

Hoàn is 51 years old. She is married, with one child. Hoàn is the group leader of the 11.01.03 Trường Thi solidarity group, which consists of six members. Each member will use her portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their family's living. Hoàn supports ome dependent with her business in Thanh Hoa city, a semi-urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hoàn's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Hoàn has been involved in this business for eight years. The main hardship that Hoàn faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Hoàn and her family hope for the family to be healthy and happy, the children to do well in school, and the business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase porcelain products (e.g., bowls, plates, cups) to resell.

loans.name: Mun

texts.en: Mun is 65 years old. She is widowed and resides with two children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 daily. Her daughter is a garment worker who makes about $4 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Mun is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase a sewing machine and cloth to run a tailoring shop at home. This money will help her acquire the ability to run a new business and enable her to generate more income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her shop and rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and cloth to run a tailoring shop

loans.name: 11.01.04 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hạnh operates a food stall/restaurant, selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to resell.

Hạnh is 46 years old. She is married, with two children. Hạnh is the group leader of the 11.01.04 Trường Thi solidarity group, which consists of five members. Each member will use her portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their family's living. Hanh lives with one dependent and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. Another child is grown up.

This is Hạnh's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Hạnh has been involved in this business for nine years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Hạnh and her family hope for their children to find a good job, their business to do well, and their family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to resell.

loans.name: Uchkun

texts.ru: Учкун родился и вырос в сельской местности. Он с детства помогал родителям по скотоводству и земледелию, так как в сельской местности люди в основном занимаются этим бизнесом, и его родители тоже занимались земледелием и скотоводством. Учкуну 34 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Более 12  лет он самостоятельно занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как картофель, пшеницу, морковь и т.п. Полученный доход он продает на рынке. Так как у него высококачественный урожай, так и его товары имеют большой спрос. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами он хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого он должен получить больше урожая. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  10800 сомони, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения. Доход, который он будет получать от бизнеса, будет использовать для образования своих детей и улучшения условия жизни. Он нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Uchkun was born and grew up in a village. Since childhood he helped his parents with livestock breeding and farming, as the people in the village mainly worked with these businesses, and so did his parents. 

Uchkun is 34 years old. He is married and raising five children. He has worked with cultivation of crops himself for more than 12 years, growing potatoes, wheat, carrots etc. He sells the harvest at the market. As he has a high quality harvest, his goods are in large demand. His wife helps him with managing the business. 

With an aim to provide the family with all necessary resources, he would like to develop his business. To do this, he needs a larger harvest. He requests a loan in the amount of 10,800 somoni, in order to purchase mineral fertilizers. He will use the income received from the business on his children's education, and on improving living conditions. He needs and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase mineral fertilizers for a land where he grows potatoes, wheat, carrots etc.

loans.name: 02.03.01 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Toán works in agriculture, farming food. She is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer and seedlings to do agriculture.

Toán is 57 years old and she is married with 3 children. Toán is the group leader of the 02.03.01 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of 6 members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with 1 dependent.

This is Toán's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Toán has been involved in this business for 5 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Toán hopes for her children to find good jobs, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings to do agriculture.

loans.name: 3.05.330.4.thiệu Nguyên Group

texts.en:
Định is applying for a loan to purchase instruments to maintain her photocopy shop. She has a service business providing photocopies.

Định is 26 years old and married with 2 children.
Định is the group leader of the 3.05.330.4.Thiệu Nguyên solidarity group, which consists of 6 members. 
Định lives with 2 dependents in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2009, Định joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Định has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Định has been involved in this business for 5 years.
One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Định hopes to build a new house, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase instruments to maintain her photocopy shop

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора женщина 38 лет. Замужем, мать двоих замечательный детей. Гулнора очень доброжелательный человек. Она всегда старается помогать тем, кто нуждается в помощи. Она очень любит работу по  хозяйству.   Увлекается приготовлением разнообразных блюд. Муж Гулноры Обиджан. У них очень крепкая семья, они понимает друг друга и принимают общее решение в возникших проблем. Гулнора после замужества была домохозяйкой, так как в ВУЗ она не поступала в связи с финансовым недостатком.  Доход мужа Гулноры это посев и в дальнейшем реализация сельхоз культур. На жизнь она не жалуется так как всегда стремится добиться лучшего. Гулнора занимается откормом крупно рогатого скота дома. Дополнительно подрабатывает поваром в столовой. Со снижением цен на КРС в летний период Гулнора хочет закупить крупно рогатый скот для откорма. В связи с этим она обратилась в организацию Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Гулнора заранее выражает свою благодарность организации  Арванд.
texts.en:
Gulnora is a woman of 38 years. She is married and the mother of two wonderful children. Gulnora is a friendly person. She always tries to help those who need it. She loves doing household work. She is fond of preparing different meals. 

Gulnora's husband is Obidzhan. They have a very strong family and they help each other and make decisions together on any problems arising. After the marriage Gulnora was a housewife, as could not start university due to financial disadvantages. Gulnora's husband's income comes from planting and then selling field crops. Gulnora never complains about life, as she always strives to achieve more. 

Due to lower prices on cattle in the summer period, Gulnora wants to purchase cattle for fattening. Due to this she turned to the Arvand organization for financial support. Gulnora expresses her gratitude to Arvand in advance.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: 03.2 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Được is applying for a loan to purchase incense and ghost money to resell. She has a retail business selling incense and ghost money.

Được is 54 years old and she is married with one child. She is the group leader of the 3.2 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of five members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

This is Được's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Được faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profits, Được hopes for her children to do well in school, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase incense and ghost money to resell

loans.name: 3.05.329.thiệu Nguyên Group

texts.en:
Khuyên is applying for a loan to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in the future. She works in agriculture, raising poultry and cattle.

Khuyên is 28 years old and she is married, with one child. Khuyên is the group leader of the 3.05.329.Thiệu Nguyên solidarity group, which consists of four members. Khuyên supports one dependent with her business in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Khuyên joined the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women to improve her business. Khuyên has successfully repaid two loans from the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Khuyên has been involved in this business for six years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Khuyên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: 12-02-05 Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Nga is applying for a loan to purchase more poultry and cattle to raise. She works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle.

Nga is 44 years old and married with two children.
Nga is the group leader of the 12-02-05 Quảng Tâm solidarity group, which consists of 7 members. 
She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with 1 dependent. Another child of hers is grown up.

This is Nga's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Nga has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more poultry and cattle to raise

loans.name: 12-02-08 Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phương has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase dry food for resale.

Phương is 47 years old and married with three children.
She is the leader of an 8-member group, the 12-02-08 Quảng Tâm solidarity group. 
She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents. Another child is grown up.

This is Phương's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Phương has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hadrship that Phương faces in her business is a lack of capital.

In the future, Phương hopes for her children to find a good job, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase dry food for resale.

loans.name: Erdenebaatar

texts.en: Mr. Erdenebaatar, 30 years old, lives with his wife in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The couple resides in a traditional Mongolian ger (portable felt dwelling) on fenced land. He graduated from medical college in 2007 and since that he has been working as a dental technician in a private pharmacy. His wife has the same profession but is currently unemployed and stays at home. He is requesting a loan of 6,800,000 Mongolian tögrög (MNT) to purchase building materials such as bricks, cements, grindstone and sand in order to build a house foundation and walls. As winter is approaching, he is preparing to build a house which is far better than traditional Mongolian ger in both preserving warmth and living comfort. Also moving from a ger to a house has economic and environmental advantages because reduction in loss of heat results in less use and purchase of coal.
